selection_reasoning: GEN 6 FAILED TO BREAK PLATEAU! The hex grid + basin hopping + SLSQP combo is actually optimal for our time budget. Return to trial_5_14 and focus on: (1) longer runs with same approach, (2) extract actual coordinates from best solution as warm start, (3) very fine parameter tuning.
